00033   enum StartStopIndication {   StartStopIndication_NA     = 0x0,   StartStopIndication_First  = 0x1,   StartStopIndication_Middle = 0x2,   StartStopIndication_Final  = 0x3
00038   };

00301     public: int8_t getAssocPacketCount () const;

00303 
00314     public: inline StartStopIndication getStartStopIndication () const {
00315       boolNull bit11 = isBit11();
00316       boolNull bit10 = isBit10();
00317       if (bit11 == _NULL || bit10 == _NULL) {
00318         return StartStopIndication_NA;
00319       }
00320       else if (bit11 == _FALSE) {
00321         return (bit10==_FALSE)? StartStopIndication_NA : StartStopIndication_First;
00322       }
00323       else {
00324         return (bit10==_FALSE)? StartStopIndication_Middle : StartStopIndication_Final;
00325       }
00326     }
00327

00414     public: void setAssocPacketCount (int8_t v);
00415 
00427     public: inline void setStartStopIndication (StartStopIndication v) {
00428       switch(v) {
00429         case StartStopIndication_NA:     setBit11(_FALSE); setBit10(_FALSE); break; // 00
00430         case StartStopIndication_First:  setBit11(_FALSE); setBit10(_TRUE ); break; // 01
00431         case StartStopIndication_Middle: setBit11(_TRUE ); setBit10(_FALSE); break; // 10
00432         case StartStopIndication_Final:  setBit11(_TRUE ); setBit10(_TRUE ); break; // 11
00433         default:                         setBit11(_NULL ); setBit10(_NULL ); break; // NULL
00434       }
00435     }
00436 
00441     public: inline void unsetStartStopIndication () { setBit11(_NULL ); setBit10(_NULL ); }
00442

00678     public: inline void getData (const PayloadFormat &pf, vector<char> &array, size_t offset, bool convert=true) const {
00679       if (array.size() < (offset+getPayloadLength())) {
00680         throw VRTException("Illegal offset (%d) for array of length %d", offset, array.size());
00681       }
00682       getData(pf, (void*)&array[offset], convert);
00683     }

00723     public: inline double* getDataDouble (const PayloadFormat &pf, double *array) const {
00724       int32_t len = getScalarDataLength(pf);
00725       PackUnpack::unpackAsDouble(pf, &bbuf[0], getPrologueLength(), &array[0], NULL, NULL, len);
00726       return array;
00727     }

01192     public: inline void setData (const PayloadFormat &pf, const vector<char> &array, size_t offset, int32_t length, bool convert=true) {
